message.content: Most women in Spain have a positive view of divorce and consider it a viable option for unhappy marriages. They believe that divorce provides an opportunity for personal growth, independence, and the chance to pursue their own happiness. Women in Spain generally support the idea of divorce as a means to escape abusive or unfulfilling relationships and prioritize their own well-being and that of their children. They also value the legal and financial protections that divorce offers, ensuring their rights and entitlements are upheld. Overall, women in Spain see divorce as a way to break free from unhappy marriages and embrace a more fulfilling and empowered life.
